item.title: About This Site
item.description: What is Tondauer? Tondauer (in German, the duration of a sound) is a project that aims to support the longevity of compositions that deserve more attention than they have received. Tondauer editions are Creative Commons licensed, and are intended to allow musicians to make informed choices about interpretation. “Many musicians … have no awareness of the importance of consciously choosing an edition; which criteria to apply; which criteria may have been applied in editing; why and how to make a good choice.
